network.param.modules.person.contacts

Interface IContactsManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContactsManager

    public interface IContactsManager
    Perform customer related operations.

    IContactsManager add/invite/edit/get/getAll contacts from the ParamNetwork. Using NetworkManager can able to access this reference.

    IContactsManager contactsManager = networkManager.getContactsManager();

    Want to perform any bulk upload items to implement this interface IBulkImport interface for remote files, for local files use FileBulkFileImportConfig.

    ICatalogue defines below categories of operations:

    • addContact method for add contact object into ParamNetwork

    • editContact method for edit contact object into ParamNetwork

    • getAllContacts method for get all contacts IDs from ParamNetwork

    • getContact method for get customer for a given ID from ParamNetwork

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jitendra Kumar Balla, ParamNetwork

    • Method Detail

      • addContact

        void addContact(IContact contact)
         throws NetworkException,
                InvalidConfigException
        Method add contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - contact to be add.
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
        InvalidConfigException - Any required fields are missing it will throw an exception.

      • editContact

        void editContact(IContact contact)
          throws AccessDeniedException,
                 NetworkException
        Method update contact.

        Method will check all the validations checks are pass, system has active internet access and valid key, it will edit IContact in the ParamNetwork, Otherwise it will throw an exception.

        Parameters:
        contact - IContact
        Throws:
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • getContact

        void getContact(java.lang.String id)
         throws AccessDeniedException,
                NetworkException
        Method will fetch contact for a given id.

        First method will check system has active internet access, requested contact ID is exists and Has access for the resource then, it will return IContact. Otherwise it will throw an exception.

        Parameters:
        id - Blockchain ID
        Throws:
        AccessDeniedException - Not having enough access rights then it will throw an error
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.

      • getAllContacts

        java.lang.String[] getAllContacts()
                           throws NetworkException
        Method will return all contacts ID's.
        Returns:
        Array of contacts ID's
        Throws:
        NetworkException - Unable to connect to ParamNode it will raise exception.
